Non-premium Telegram users may see ads in this and other channels. We have no control over these ads and a lot of them are phishing scams. If you spot random ads here, ignore them. Never engage with messages claiming you can claim more $PENGU.

Official updates will always be posted across multiple channels, including X and Discord. âœ
